title: Textile, "The Coral Garden", 1987
medium: Technique: screen printed on plain weave foundation
inscribed: Along each side, "THE CORAL GARDEN From The Collection ROMANTIC LANDSCAPES By Warner Copyright (symbol) MCMLXXXVII By Warner & Sons Limited (arrow) Top (color registration circles)".
dimensions:
Warp: 267cm (104 1/4in.). Weft: 142cm (56in.)
Pattern: Design from a half-drop repeat  on width.                                  Height of unit: 72cm (28 1/4in.)                                           Width of unit:67.5 (26 1/2in.)
description: Various corals and seaweeds. 4 pinks, 5 blues, grey, whote and brown. Width of pattern is136.5cm (53 3/4) leaving a margin on both sides.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "The Coral Garden", 1987.
1987. Technique: screen printed on plain weave foundation. Gift of Eddie Squires. 1992-3-25.
